I'm a 17 year old undergraduate student studying mathematics at the University of Waterloo from Hong Kong studying in Canada. I'd like to major in computational mathematics. I go by Tnixc online.

I love programming and design. You can learn more about me on about.

Work

I now mostly work with Rust. I love compilers, language design, type theory, and performance engineering.

I've also worked with JavaScript & TypeScript, Java, Python and other web development languages with frameworks such as Vue, Svelte, Solid.

You can view my projects on my GitHub.
